RITOPLS

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • RITOPLS.Parser

  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class parses the current League of Legends service status data for a region specified by the user.

        private java.lang.String buildUrl(java.lang.String region)
        Builds a URL to reflect the region the user selected.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The API status url containing the current region.

      • pollTest

        public void pollTest(int count,
            java.lang.String region)
        Used to test the functionality of the created thread that periodically polls the League of Legends API.
        Parameters:
        count - The number of time the server was queried.
        region - The region selected by the user.

      • getStatus

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>>>>> getStatus(java.lang.String region)
                                                                                                                                                                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Parses the JSON that was obtained from the League of Legends API. Google's Gson is used as the parsing utility.
        Parameters:
        region - The region selected by the user.
        Returns:
        The status of the specified service in the specified region.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • formatOutput

        private java.lang.String formatOutput(java.lang.String raw)
        Formats the status obtained from the League of Legends API to remove surrounding quotations and begin with a capital letter.
        Parameters:
        raw - The raw status string that was parsed.
        Returns:
        A formatted status string.

      • networkCheck

        public boolean networkCheck(java.lang.String region)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Performs a network check by attempting to connect to the API.
        Parameters:
        region - The current region.
        Returns:
        True if openStream() was successful, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • isNetworkUp

        public boolean isNetworkUp()
        Gets the status of your connection to the status servers.
        Returns:
        True if a connection was made, false otherwise.
